episodes.title: Disney Channel Star Christy Carlson Romano Acting CULTY?!
episodes.description:
Christy Carlson Romano was a Disney channel child star best known for her role as Ren in Even Stevens, the voice of Kim Possible, and Captain Jennifer Stone in Cadet Kelly. 

Now, Christy creates content based on millennial nostalgia, a sometimes cringe but really popular niche on social media. 

She's been under fire recently after being accused of platforming alleged predators on her podcast called Vulnerable, in this deep dive I ask the question, is she also being culty?



Did you know I have art available? https://thecassiemarie.gumroad.com

episodes.title: The CULT of YWAM: Amanda's Story Part Two NIKO
episodes.description: Amanda bravely comes forward to share her story of the horrifying experience she had on her YWAM DTS and YWAM’s NIKO survival camp. I have talked at length about YWAM and the dangerous cult like characteristics that everyone should take into account before they choose to do anything with this organization, whether that’s a standard DTS, volunteer position, or otherwise.   Amanda shares what she wishes she knew before saying yes to YWAM Denver and how the experience effected her life for years after she left. This story is in two parts, part one is Amanda’s experience start to finish, and Part Two is exclusively what she experience at NIKO. episodes.title: The Sound Of Freedom's Tim Ballard Denounced by the Mormon Church
episodes.description: News spread quickly after Vice New published an article that included a statement from the Mormon church denouncing Tim Ballard and claiming they don't agree with him or his morally questionable behaviors. Soon after, Vice news also published an article detailing allegations of s**ual misconduct by Tim Ballard during his time working on missions at Operation Underground Railroad. Let's dig in to the details in this video.  Mormon Stories-  @mormonstories   Lynn Packer-  @lynnkennethpacker8389    Vice News Articles- https://www.vice.com/en/article/pkaqvn/tim-ballards-departure-from-operation-underground-railroad-followed-sexual-misconduct-investigation  https://www.vice.com/en/article/bvjypz/mormon-church-denounces-tim-ballards-morally-unacceptable-activities  https://www.vice.com/en/article/z3mq5w/sound-of-freedom-producer-underage-trafficking-victim  https://www.vice.com/en/article/m7bpda/operation-underground-railroad-child-rescue-missions-were-based-on-psychic-intelligence   Did you know I have art available? https://thecassiemarie.gumroad.com   Follow Cassie on  TikTok- www.TikTok.com/@the.cassiemarie Instagram- www.instagram.com/the.cassiemarie YouTube- ​⁠​⁠   @Nocultyvibes   Listen to No Culty Vibes with Cassie Marie-  https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/no-culty-vibes/id1564792393  https://open.spotify.com/show/7HHbJMlu2vIwkVvQJYr0Eq?si=aMHLoHVJThSKbWfY6p-4cA  Or wherever you get your podcasts

episodes.title: Danny Masterson Sentenced to Life in Prison, Ashton Kutcher Sends His Support
episodes.description: On September 7th, 2023, Danny Masterson was sentenced to life in prison and will be eligible for parole in 25.5 years. In the notes from the sentencing hearing, we learned Alanna Masterson not only supported her brother throughout the trial, but also intimidated Jane Doe 1 while she was having a panic attack in the bathroom. We also learned from an ABC7 news reporter that Ashton Kutcher and Mila Kunis also sent in letters of support for their good friend Danny Masterson ahead of his sentencing. Lets discuss! episodes.description: There's been a lot of misinformation and rumors swirling around the internet about Ruby Franke and Jodi Hildebrants arrest, much of which I initially talked about as well, so I wanted to share a video with just the facts that we know so far.   Please take care as this video mentions difficult topics and child harm and exploitation. You know what's best for you, so please skip this video if these topics are difficult.  8 Passengers Deep Dive video- https://www.youtube.com/live/g7wFfMo9nng?si=D33nM23zjzmXy4B2  Follow Cassie on  TikTok- www.TikTok.com/@the.cassiemarie Instagram- www.instagram.com/the.cassiemarie YouTube- ​⁠​⁠   @Nocultyvibes  Check Out  @JordanandMcKay  on YouTube  Did you know I have art available? https://thecassiemarie.gumroad.com

episodes.title: 8 Passengers Deep Dive: The Cults That Led to Ruby Franke's Arrest
episodes.description: When I heard the news that Ruby Franke from 8 passengers was finally arrested, I wanted to go back to the beginning to look at how undue influence, coercive control, and cult like dynamics played a part in how we got to this horrific incident. If you're curious about the story behind the Franke family and 8 passengers from the perspective of the cults they were part of, I hope this video helps give a better understanding of how this family became a viral news story.   Please take care as this video mentions difficult topics and child harm and exploitation. You know what's best for you, so please skip this video if these topics are difficult.  Follow Cassie on  TikTok- www.TikTok.com/@the.cassiemarie Instagram- www.instagram.com/the.cassiemarie YouTube- ​⁠​⁠   @Nocultyvibes    Shop Culty Art- https://thecassiemarie.gumroad.com

episodes.title: The Cult of YWAM Part Two: Leah's Story
episodes.description: You can support the show by visiting https://thecassiemarie.gumroad.com for digital art prints, exclusive audio recordings, and more!  In this episode I talk to former YWAM DTS student Leah about her difficult experience at a YWAM base in Brisbane, Australia. There are so many aspects of her story that line up with very common aspects of undue influence and coercive control, and it's a great example of why I and many others refer to YWAM as a cult.  I appreciate Leah so much for being willing to share her thoughts. We hope people who relate can hear her story and know they're not alone and we hope people considering attending YWAM will listen with an open mind. Don't forget to follow me on TikTok and Instagram @the.cassiemarie.  I LOVE hearing your thoughts on these episodes and would love this to turn into an even bigger discussion.

episodes.title: Former Hillsong College Student Discussing The Secrets of Hillsong and Carl Lentz
episodes.description: In this video I talk to my new friend Rachel about the first two episodes of the new Hulu and FX docuseries The Secrets of Hillsong. Rachel attended Hillsong college back in 2000 and 2001 and was in her second year as Carl entered his first. In addition to sharing her feelings on the docuseries, Rachel shares how she and others felt about Carl Lentz before Brian Houston and Hillsong elevated him to the level of celebrity pastor.   I appreciate Rachel so much for being willing to share her thoughts. We believe it's important for people to have access to all sides of this story and be aware of the risks of being in a church with Carl Lentz strategizing or speaking in any way. Hillsong and Carl Lentz still have a lot to answer for, and we hope this story brings a little more light to the story.   Don't forget to follow me on TikTok and Instagram @the.cassiemarie. I LOVE hearing your thoughts on these episodes and would love this to turn into an even bigger discussion.

episodes.title: The Secrets of Hillsong: The Full Details of Carl Lentz, Laura Lentz, + Leona Kimes
episodes.description: In this episode of Into The Cultiverse I discuss my in depth feelings about the first two episodes of the new FX and Hulu Docuseries The Secrets of Hillsong. I mostly focus on the inconsistencies in Carl and Laura’s story vs Leona’s statement and details from the internal investigation conducted by a third party after Carl and Laura were fired. I would love to hear your thoughts, so feel free to follow me on Instagram @the.cassiemarie and find the post about this episode to leave your comments! Also follow me on TikTok at the same handle. Thanks so much for listening.

episodes.title: The Cult of YWAM Part One: History, Organization Structure, and Accusations
episodes.description: In this episode were deep diving into YWAM, or Youth With A Mission. This organization is problematic, culty, harmful, and potentially very dangerous. From accusations of Spiritual Abuse to covering up Sexual Assault, this organization has no remorse and no accountability. This episode can be triggering for some so please take care if you choose to listen. More to come on the cult of YWAM. You can find Cassie Marie on Instagram and TikTok with the same handle @the.cassiemarie

episodes.title: Discussing the Danny Masterson Trial and Scientology with Liz Gale
episodes.description: Liz Gale is a 3rd generation ex Scientologist that was featured on an episode of Leah Remini's Scientology and The Aftermath, but as we learned in this TikTok live turned podcast episode, she's also so much more than her story. In this episode Liz and Cassie discuss the Danny Masterson criminal trial that's still awaiting a verdict at the time of recording and publishing this conversation. They also discuss other Scientology news, a little bit about their own lives post culty encounters, and the book Liz wrote and hopes to publish in the near future.    If you want to know more about Liz, you can find her on TikTok:  https://www.tiktok.com/@liz_liz_gale_gale You can find Cassie on  Instagram and TikTok   www.Instagram.com/the.cassiemarie   https://vm.tiktok.com/ZTdHkTUx5/

episodes.title: Culty Coaching Tactics and Informed Consent with Dani Driusso Part Two
episodes.description: Dani Driusso is the powerhouse author, speaker and facilitator behind the Unleash Your Voice Podcast. With her unique frameworks around Sustainable Confidence, I.C.O.N.I.C leadership and Social Media Consent, Dani helps personal brands step into the digital spotlight without sacrificing their values for success. Her goal is to support her client’s in building a fully immersive experience for their brand with a vibrant approach to helping them ‘own the f out of who they are’ online and offline. You’re fabulous, stop being so secretive about it. In part one of my conversation with Dani, we talk about her journey from the MLM industry to online business coaching to her whole world changing when she shifted her business from online to only in person events and book signings riiiiiight before a global pandemic.  Which is when Dani started making connections between cults and the coaching industry and decided to use her experience with ethics, leadership, education, and her background in theatre to begin teaching about leadership and consent in the online business space.  The work Dani does is so important and I'm so excited to share it with you.  If you want to know more about Dani, you can find her here: http://danieledriusso.com/howtoworkwithme/ https://www.instagram.com/danidriusso/ You can find Cassie on  Instagram and TikTok  www.Instagram.com/the.cassiemarie  https://vm.tiktok.com/ZTdHkTUx5/  And you can support the show on Patreon  https://www.patreon.com/nocultyvibes

episodes.title: Is Worship Music Culty? with Tim Austin
episodes.description: In this episode Cassie and her friend Tim Austin deep dive into their experience in a Christian church that was a little culty and explore the cultiness of worship music and the worship experience.   Tim Austin is an amazing drummer and has spent the majority of his teens and twenties playing in worship bands in different churches all over the east coast. He’s now killing it drumming for the band Companyon and his own solo drum experiences.   You can find Tim on Instagram   www.Instagram.com/timothyjaustin  www.Instagram.com/companyonmusic  You can find Cassie on Instagram and TikTok  www.Instagram.com/the.cassiemarie   https://vm.tiktok.com/ZTdHkTUx5/  And you can support the show on Patreon   https://www.patreon.com/nocultyvibes

episodes.title: The Horrors of Hillsong (and other Pentecostal churches)
episodes.description: **Trigger warning ⛔️ Child Abus3, SA, CP, CSAM, violence, suicidal thoughts, pregnancy loss**   In this episode I’m sharing listener stories of the harm and abuse they experienced in churches like Hillsong, Bethel, United Pentecostal Church International and more.   Follow me on   Instagram- www.instagram.com/the.cassiemarie TikTok- https://vm.tiktok.com/TTPdmXRtB2/   No Culty Vibes is on Patreon!   www.Patreon.com/nocultyvibes

episodes.title: Unraveling Evangelical Christianity and Diet Culture with Candace Nichole
episodes.description: In episode four of No Culty Vibes, Cassie talks to Candace about her roots in Evangelical Christianity and how it affected her experience in the beauty and wellness space, MLM culture, Diet Culture and so much more. Candace talks about how she is deconstructing and reconstructing her whole belief system and how she's making sense of the world as she moves forward. I know so many of us can resonate with Candace's journey, and I hope you get a lot out of this conversation.   You can find Candace on Instagram- www.instagram.com/hellocandacenichole You can find Cassie on Instagram- www.instagram.com/the.cassiemarie YouTube- https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCnosc9QuvgazPAL9U0UKMdg and TikTok- @the.cassiemarie

episodes.title: Unraveling The Coaching Industry with Andi Williams
episodes.description: TRIGGER WARNING *cults, toxic religion, SA, indoctrination and manipulation*   Impacting the world, manipulative marketing, shame spirals, farms and cults, casting out demons, wholeness, and learning to trust yourself most of all.   In this episode, Andi Williams shares her story of her coaching industry experiences. From a desire to impact the world, to a coaching relationship that turned into a nightmare, to where helping her community and clients in a way that feels good to her while actually helping them create the transformation they desire.    We talk about what cult leaders and some coaches have in common, how people slowly indoctrinate others into their belief systems, and how pain points and manipulative industry tactics are never required.   Through this process Andi has come to know that all humans are whole, no matter where they come from or what they've been through, and that we can truly trust ourselves more than anyone else.    You can find Andi on    Instagram- www.instagram.com/therealandiwilliams  Facebook- www.facebook.com/andiwilliams295    You can find Cassie on    Instagram and TikTok @the.cassiemarie

episodes.title: Unlearning
episodes.description: In this episode of No Culty Vibes, Cassie shares her story of religious deconstruction, business deconstruction, and unlearning so many of the beliefs in her life that caused shame and fear. She share the major turning points that lead her to drawing parallels between religion, cults, MLMs, some coaches, the self help industry, the spiritual growth industry, and so much more. Find Cassie on Instagram and TikTok @the.cassiemarie to stay connected.
